hero.title: Hey, I'm Dino
hero.description: I help service companies boost productivity and create more value for their clients through AI.

additi_description.intro: I transformed operational challenges into AI innovations. In 18 months, I automated critical business processes, reducing processing times by 60 to 83% depending on use cases.

items.label: Challenge
items.text: 60min preparation = barrier to systematic preparation

items.label: Solution
items.text: Reduced to 10min = crossing the adoption threshold

items.label: Transformation
items.text: Increased number of prepared meetings and quality

items.label: Impact
items.text: 100 sales reps adopt a new qualitative practice

items.label: Challenge
items.text: Partial manual control on 70,000 ads/month = legal risks

items.label: Solution
items.text: Automated scan of 100% creations before broadcast

items.label: Transformation
items.text: From partial control to comprehensive coverage

items.label: Impact
items.text: Zero non-compliance risk + peace of mind for studio team

items.label: Challenge
items.text: Disparate training for sales and customer care teams = uneven skill development

items.label: Solution
items.text: AI assistant available 24/7 for training and support

items.label: Transformation
items.text: Standardization of training support

items.label: Impact
items.text: Homogeneous skill development + instant support

items.label: Challenge
items.text: 60min creation per ad = studio bottleneck

items.label: Solution
items.text: Prototype theoretically reducing to 20min production

items.label: Learning
items.text: Technical performance validated, adoption failure (poor UX)

items.label: Lesson
items.text: The best technical solution is worthless without user experience

experience.vinci_description: I administered a SAP database, created dashboards and initiated the creation of an inventory management system.

imago_description.intro: I industrialized prospecting and optimized technical infrastructure. As head of tools and IT, I transformed manual processes into automated commercial machines.

items.label: Challenge
items.text: Manual prospecting = limited volume and random results

items.label: Solution
items.text: LinkedIn + Cold Email orchestration via specialized tools (Waalaxy, Lemlist...)

items.label: Transformation
items.text: From artisanal approach to industrialized commercial machine

items.label: Impact
items.text: Multiplied volume of prospects reached + personalization at scale

items.label: Challenge
items.text: Incomplete prospect data = poor performing campaigns

items.label: Solution
items.text: Automated collection (Phantombuster, Apify) + enrichment (Hunter, Dropcontact)

items.label: Transformation
items.text: Quality prospect database continuously fed

items.label: Impact
items.text: Improved conversion rates thanks to qualified data

items.label: Challenge
items.text: Manual reporting = time loss + lack of real-time visibility

items.label: Solution
items.text: Automated dashboards for client campaigns + ROI financial tracking

items.label: Transformation
items.text: From weekly reporting to real-time monitoring

items.label: Impact
items.text: Optimized management + reinforced commercial reactivity

items.label: Challenge
items.text: Dependence on external tools + specific needs not covered

items.label: Solution
items.text: Managed development of proprietary LinkedIn solution + internal communication migration

items.label: Transformation
items.text: Increased technical autonomy of the agency

items.label: Impact
items.text: Complete control of technical stack + centralized IT management

education.msc_description: The MSc Big Data Management trained me at the intersection of management and massive data analysis. I acquired skills in programming, AI and digital strategy, enabling me to lead data projects and create value for organizations through data-driven approaches.
education.msc_skills: Python ¬∑ SQL ¬∑ Machine Learning ¬∑ Deep Learning ¬∑ LLMs ¬∑ Prompt Engineering ¬∑ Data Analysis ¬∑ Data Visualization
education.mba_description: The MBA Expert Digital Marketing trained me in e-business, digital marketing and web entrepreneurship. I acquired skills in digital strategy, management and finance, enabling me to understand business challenges in the digital environment and contribute effectively to companies' digital transformation.
education.mba_skills: Digital Marketing ¬∑ SEO ¬∑ SEA ¬∑ Social Media ¬∑ Analytics ¬∑ Growth Hacking ¬∑ CRM ¬∑ Web Marketing
education.bachelor_description: The Bachelor in Business and Management trained me in marketing, management and commerce. I acquired skills enabling me to lead projects and contribute effectively to company growth.
education.bachelor_skills: Marketing ¬∑ Management ¬∑ Commerce ¬∑ Project Management ¬∑ Communication ¬∑ Sales ¬∑ Negotiation

projects.clustering_description: Analysis platform for Le Poool ecosystem companies (French-Tech Rennes / Saint-Malo). Machine Learning for automatic clustering, generative AI for cluster naming. Modern interface with custom treemap enabling interactive detail display and 3D visualizations.
projects.budget_title: Budget Tracking - Cr√©dit Agricole Google Sheets
projects.budget_description: Automation of data retrieval from the Cr√©dit Agricole application for expense and income tracking.
projects.ips_title: Analysis of French Schools' Social Position Index
projects.ips_description: Project carried out as part of a course, it allows visualization of Social Position Index data for French educational institutions.
projects.hackathon_ft_description: In 24h, we created a solution that adapts newspaper articles to different audiences using AI. We won 1st prize.
projects.hackathon_additi_description: In 24h, we created a solution dedicated to client acquisition. We won 1st prize.

certifications.langchain_description: Training on using LangChain and vector databases in production.
certifications.deeplearning_description: Deep Learning specialization by Andrew Ng, covering neural networks, optimization, CNNs and RNNs.
certifications.prompt_description: Training on prompt engineering for developers, by DeepLearning.AI and OpenAI.
certifications.building_title: Building Systems with the ChatGPT API
certifications.building_description: Training on building systems with the ChatGPT API, by DeepLearning.AI and OpenAI.
certifications.ml_engineer_description: Advanced training covering a broad spectrum of Machine Learning techniques, from supervised to deep learning. Develops applicable expertise from predictive analysis to advanced AI.
certifications.data_engineer_description: Complete training in data engineering, from import to ETL/ELT pipeline deployment. Develops skills in flow automation and scalable data infrastructure design.
certifications.data_scientist_description: Complete program combining theoretical foundations and practical applications in data science. Focus on solving real problems with essential Python libraries.
certifications.python_programmer_description: In-depth Python programming course, from data manipulation to advanced development practices. Aims for complete mastery for various applications in data science.
certifications.data_analyst_description: Targeted training on data analysis, covering manipulation, visualization and statistical inference. Develops the ability to extract insights and make data-driven decisions.

about.approach_end: . AI should amplify humans, not replace them. From Python to no-code tools, I design solutions that free your teams from technical constraints so they can excel in their field of expertise.
about.value_end: . Smart prospecting, optimized workflows, automated reports... my solutions adapt to your specific challenges. Less time on repetitive tasks, more focus on your

services.automation_description: Transform your repetitive tasks into automated workflows. Business process optimization, automatic validation and intelligent reporting to free your teams.
services.ai_integration_description: Automate your client deliverables with generative AI. Accelerate your consulting processes, optimize the quality of your analyses and multiply your production capacity.
services.ai_integration_highlight_1: Automated generation of client reports and analyses
services.ai_integration_highlight_2: Validation and compliance systems for your deliverables
services.ai_integration_highlight_3: Custom AI tools for your methodologies
services.lead_generation_description: Boost your lead generation campaigns with premium data. Massive collection, intelligent enrichment and delivery of ultra-qualified prospect databases.
services.lead_generation_highlight_3: Databases ready for your client campaigns
services.consulting_description: Support your clients in AI with our technical expertise. Develop new services, strengthen your commercial proposals and stand out from the competition.
services.consulting_highlight_1: Co-development of AI offerings for your clients
services.consulting_highlight_2: Technical support for your AI missions
services.consulting_highlight_3: Training your teams in AI technologies
